import React from 'react' import '../styles/Filter.css' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; export default function Filter() { const [restaurants,setRestaurants]=useState([]) const [filter,setFilter]=useState({ city_id:'', name:'', lcost:'', hcost:'', sort:1 }) const handleSort=(sort)=>{ filter.sort=sort; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCost=(lcost,hcost)=>{ filter.lcost=lcost; filter.hcost=hcost; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCuisine=(e)=>{ if(e.target.checked) filter.name.push(e.target.name) else{ let index=filter.name.indexOf(e.target.name) if(index>-1) filter.name.splice(index,1) } setFilter({...filter}) } useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`http://localhost:9090/restaurant/filter/1`, {method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify(filter) }).then(response=>response.json()) .then(data=>setRestaurants(data.data)) },[filter]) return (
